trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Brightspace by Desire2Learn | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Brightspace by Desire2Learn | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Brightspace by Desire2Learn with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Brightspace by Desire2Learn with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Brightspace by Desire2Learn.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Brightspace by Desire2Learn.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Brightspace by Desire2Learn single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A Brightspace by Desire2Learn single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Brightspace by Desire2Learn will be able to single sign into the application at your Brightspace by Desire2Learn company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Brightspace by Desire2Learn will be able to single sign into the application at your Brightspace by Desire2Learn company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Brightspace by Desire2Learn
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Brightspace by Desire2Learn

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Brightspace by Desire2Learn.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Brightspace by Desire2Learn.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Brightspace by Desire2Learn.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Brightspace by Desire2Learn.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Apllication Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Apllication Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Brightspace by Desire2Learn, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Brightspace by Desire2Learn, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Brightspace by Desire2Learn</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Brightspace by Desire2Learn</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Brightspace by Desire2Learn with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Brightspace by Desire2Learn with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Brightspace by Desire2Learn application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Brightspace by Desire2Learn application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Brightspace by Desire2Learn page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Brightspace by Desire2Learn page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Sign On URL textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign into your Brightspace by Desire2Learn (e.g.: https://partnershowcase.desire2learn.com/Shibboleth.sso/Login?entityID=https://sts.windows-ppe.net/5caf9349-fd93-4a74-b064-0070f65bfb49/&target=https%3A%2F%2Fpartnershowcase.desire2learn.com%2Fd2l%2FshibbolethSSO%2Faspinfo.asp).
trans-unit.target: In the Sign On URL textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign into your Brightspace by Desire2Learn (e.g.: https://partnershowcase.desire2learn.com/Shibboleth.sso/Login?entityID=https://sts.windows-ppe.net/5caf9349-fd93-4a74-b064-0070f65bfb49/&target=https%3A%2F%2Fpartnershowcase.desire2learn.com%2Fd2l%2FshibbolethSSO%2Faspinfo.asp).

trans-unit.source: Click Next
trans-unit.target: Click Next

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Brightspace by Desire2Learn page, to download your metadata, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Brightspace by Desire2Learn page, to download your metadata, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Send the downloaded metadata file to your Brightspace by Desire2Learn support team.
trans-unit.target: Send the downloaded metadata file to your Brightspace by Desire2Learn support team.

trans-unit.source: Your Brightspace by Desire2Learn support team has to do the actual SSO configuration.
trans-unit.target: Your Brightspace by Desire2Learn support team has to do the actual SSO configuration.

trans-unit.source: You will get a notification when SSO has been enabled for your subscription.
trans-unit.target: You will get a notification when SSO has been enabled for your subscription.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Brightspace by Desire2Learn, they must be provisioned into Brightspace by Desire2Learn.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Brightspace by Desire2Learn, they must be provisioned into Brightspace by Desire2Learn.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Brightspace by Desire2Learn, the user accounts need to be created by your Brightspace by Desire2Learn support team.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Brightspace by Desire2Learn, the user accounts need to be created by your Brightspace by Desire2Learn support team.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Brightspace by Desire2Learn user account creation tools or APIs provided by Brightspace by Desire2Learn to provision Azure Active Directory user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Brightspace by Desire2Learn user account creation tools or APIs provided by Brightspace by Desire2Learn to provision Azure Active Directory user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Brightspace by Desire2Learn **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Brightspace by Desire2Learn **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
